items.name: of

comment.description: generates high-quality documentation for code given to it by returning a `PageInfo` object containing information about the number of pages and elements in a pageable.

params.name: pageable
params.description: pagination information for the retrieved data, providing the current page number, page size, total pages, and total elements.

params.name: page
params.description: current page being processed, providing information on its position, size, and total count within the larger dataset.

returns.description: a `PageInfo` object containing page number, size, total pages, and total elements.
